word:
MR No. 461 - E. G White Comments Concerning Wright, Michigan

     Wednesday, January 19, 1859--About dark arrived at Brother Root's. They welcomed us heartily. It is a good home with plenty of house room. Sister Root is in feeble health. There was a meeting in the even. We were too weary to go. John and Brother Cramer went. Had a good meeting. . . .
